long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension simplify how you save and manage bookmarks by providing cleaned-up titles, ensuring that your bookmark list remains clutter-free and easy to navigate.

Key Features:
Clean Titles: Automatically trims long, unwieldy webpage titles to concise, user-friendly names. Say goodbye to those lengthy, SEO-heavy titles that make finding your bookmarks a chore.
Quick Access: With less text clutter, your bookmarks are now more recognizable at a glance, speeding up your workflow and making information retrieval smoother.
User Experience: Designed for minimal intervention and maximum efficiency, Trimmed Bookmark Saver enhances your daily browsing by keeping your digital bookmarks as organized as your physical desk.

Why Use Trimmed Bookmark Saver?
Reduce Clutter: Each bookmark's title is trimmed to be concise and clear.

Note: This extension does not alter the actual webpage or any data on it; it only modifies the title  of the active tab as displayed in your bookmarks. Your privacy is respected, and no data is sent to external servers.
